channel.title: Secure Strings on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Secure Strings on TLDRBins

item.title: Secure String
item.description: Decrypt secure string $s = cat pass.xml $ss = Convertto-securestring -string $s $cred = new-object -typename System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -argumentlist "administrator", $ss $cred.GetNetworkCredential().password
